name: weirdest-outfits-3
description: The Weirdest Outfits Leaderboard is a fun, interactive platform where users can log in to submit, rank, and comment on bizarre and unconventional outfits. Each user gets a unique leaderboard featuring their contributions and the rankings of other users' weird outfits. The project blends humor and creativity while demonstrating a strong proof of work across all course concepts.
